title: Unfortunately, there was an error updating your shortcuts for you.
body: I have received  that error during the newest updates and can't run the game off USB anymore. I know playing outside places without admin rights isn't the most ethical thing to do, but it was convenient. I hope they don't enforce the shortcuts or no play in the future {{champion:32}} {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

It's having problems updating your shortcuts due to the fact that it's installed onto a USB drive. It's not that doing that is "unethical" in any way, the game just likely isn't going to work correctly unless it's installed on your default drive.

My biggest suggestion for you is to completely reinstall League onto your default hard drive, where it's performance will be much better and more reliable. You also shouldn't have shortcut issues going forward if the game is installed in the proper place.
It worked before though, why'd it change now and why must we be forced to have a shortcut? It's unnecessary.
